name: INSECTOPIA
description:
This is my 3D FPS project "INSECTOPIA". I added the following elements:

  1. Replace the pistol with the new weapon.
  2. Add green terrain texture and place trees and grass.
  3. Add some new props like a Spaceship, and a destroyable rock wall.
  4. Add storyline.
  5. Change the color of the UI page.

Instructions:

The hive queen eats the door key you must kill her to get the key of the level 3 door.

Credits:

Created by Aliza Hamid
